welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Linden, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Limited free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines including American Airlines, JetBlue, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines including United Airlines, Air Canada, and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is home to many major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is the largest terminal at JFK.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is home to British Airways and other major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
